biotools.summary: Factorial HMM based algorithm. Several models are supported in this implementation, including both the standard model and the 4-track model which uses a first order Markovian model for the LD process in a subset of the founders.

bioschemas.name: IBDmap
bioschemas.summary: Factorial HMM based algorithm. Several models are supported in this implementation, including both the standard model and the 4-track model which uses a first order Markovian model for the LD process in a subset of the founders.
